Using the DecidingScope without a Transclusion rule solves my problem,
but I think it should be documented that PathScope and even
SurtPrefixScope will crawl URL's outside the given paths or SURT's if
they are embeds...this was not intuitive, to me at least, especially
when LinkScoper has an option to scope embeds.  I don't see how that
option can be useful, since according to the logs from my original
post LinkScoper was rejecting these embedded URL's but then my scope
iself was accepting them and they were getting crawled.

Thanks,
eric.
